name: CO2021
description:
Movement based FPS game, stylised on half-life series and titanfall 2. There will be a 2-3 hour singleplayer campaign, and a "sandbox" mode, showed partly inside this demo. The game features now basic mechanics, dont expect too much from this demo.  The story of this game will be presented later.

WHAT YOU CAN DO IN THIS DEMO:

You can experiment with current game mechanics, like stunning enemies with kick on the head, kicking doors on them, play with ragdolls and debugging tools.

Controls:

WASD - movement

Space/Scroll - Jump

F - Kick

I - add 25 health

O - add ammo

K - spawn troop

L - spawn spooner

For bug reports or any other contact please, comment the game or send it on my discord - pimpek32#4350. or twitter @pimpek32.
